column4: another newb question: is there any way I can view folders that start with periods using nautilus? I ssh'd into my comp and saw them, and want to get some files out of the folders, but I really don't know how to
files and folders that start with a . are the so called 'hidden files'
is there a site I can go to that would help?
look for the ndiswrapperhowto on wiki.ubuntu.com
what other system monitors are there? I know there is one that isn't stacked, but I forgot the name of it.
dunno, i only use some gdesklets for it
